description:
еЗдраве е официалното мобилно приложение на Националната здравноинформационна система, която е собственост на Министерство на здравеопазването. Приложението дава достъп на всеки гражданин до електронното му пациентско досие.

еЗдраве се сдвоява с Вашето електронно пациентско досие посредством QR код, генериран в уеб версията на медицинското Ви досие. Чрез приложението, данните от досието Ви са лесно достъпни навсякъде и по всяко време.

В приложението може да бъде открита информация за:

• Проведени е-прегледи
• Издадени е-направления
• Издадени е-рецепти
• Поставени ваксини и издадени за тях сертификати
• Резултати от лабораторни изследвания
• Модул "Болничен престой"
• Модул "Протоколи"
• Модул "Медицинска експертиза"
• Модул „Дългосрочна грижа за здравето“
• Модул „Личен картон“
• Модул „Здравна библиотека“
• Модул "Медицинска бележки"
• Модул "Известия"
• Достъп на родителите до електронните пациентски досиета на техните деца
• Обща здравна информация

Приложението еЗдраве се развива непрекъснато и постепенно в него ще бъдат добавени нови функционалности. Подробна информация за плана за развитие на еЗдраве може да намерите на сайта на Националната здравноинформационна система.

The brand new "HUAWEI Health: Europe" app has been launched to bring the "HUAWEI Health+" membership features to all users across Europe, such as "Workouts", "Yoga", "Mindful Meditation", and "Sleep Music".

Your go-to, integrated health and fitness companion. Whether you want to kick-start your fitness life, keep track of your health, or conveniently manage your smart wearable devices, the Huawei Health app has what you're looking for. Keep your data private, or share it with your loved ones, the power's yours. The latest in health and fitness technology, made simple, secure, and easy to use.

Keeps Up with Your Every Move
Keep track of your health journey. Huawei Health records your activity, supporting over 100 different sports, from beginner to advanced levels. See your workout data clearly every step of the way, so you can be sure you're reaching your goals. A wonderful world of fitness at the tip of your fingers.

Run How You Want
A simpler way to run that can benefit anyone. The app is able to record and map out your route as you're running, all while displaying key information so you can stay on target.

An Amazing Journey
Share your health journey with your friends and family. Your outdoor workout routes can be generated into videos with music for you to proudly share. Use Dynamic tracking to create videos to share on social media to inspire yourself and others with your fitness journey.

A New View on Health
See your life in amazing detail with Huawei Health stats. The app keeps records of your heart rate, weight, sleep quality, step count and more. All your data is shown in clear, dynamic graphs so you have a better understanding of your health in a more accessible way.

[health package]
·Synchronize with the weight data in healthkit. When you use the healthy weight data of Huawei mobile phone, this data will be synchronized and recorded in healthkit.
·Synchronize with motion data in healthkit. You can automatically synchronize the exercise data recorded in Huawei health to healthkit. Similarly, Huawei sports health can also obtain the exercise data from healthkit.

--------------------
Huawei Health app is not intended for medical use, and all data is for reference only.
You should seek a doctor’s advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.

--------------------
--Automatic renewal service agreement(EULA): https://consumer.huawei.com/minisite/cloudservice/health/monservice-terms.htm?country=CN&language=zh_Hans_CN
--Membership Agreement (including user privacy agreement): https://consumer.huawei.com/minisite/cloudservice/health/member-terms.htm?country=CN&language=zh_Hans_CN

** Top Rating Reproductive Health App ** 
 
Check out the most widely-used period, ovulation & pregnancy tracker, which has been helping to improve the well-being of over 300,000,000 women across 45+ countries in the past decade. 
 
We understand your concerns about your private data security, especially with the recent news.
Here's how we protect your data:
• You can use our app without creating an account.
• You remain COMPLETELY ANONYMOUS while using our app.
• You can DELETE ALL DATA in 1 click whenever you want.
 
At every stage of your life, we safeguard your well-being. 
 
PERIOD & CYCLE CALENDAR
We'll remind you of the dates when your next period starts and ends on time. It's useful whether you have irregular or regular menses. Better? You'll receive tailored PMS advice and instant menstrual pain relief guidance.
 
OVULATION & FERTILITY TRACKER
We help you calculate your most fertile days and analyze your fertility window based on your unique cycle. You can get pregnant naturally ASAP by learning your CHANCE OF CONCEPTION every day.
 
PREGNANCY MODE: WEEK-BY-WEEK 
Follow your baby's weekly growth. Use our due date calculator to find out when your baby's BIG DAY will be and count down it.
 
BIRTH CONTROL PLANNER
Quickly record and stay on track with your contraceptive methods like pills, rings, patches, injections, IUDs, or implants. You can customize the reminder message for individual services.
 
PILL REMINDER
Set start date, interval, durations, and dose quantity for any medication, drugs, or supplements. So you won't forget to take pills when life gets busy.
 
SYMPTOM PREDICTIONS & TIPS
Record your symptoms during any life stage. Get predictions and courses to learn how to deal with them. Take breast self-exam monthly to find abnormalities early.
 
>>Key Features:
- Accurate prediction & reminders of menstruation & the most fertile days 
- Track the cycle lengths, flow intensity, when you are ovulating, birth control methods, etc.
- Log 58 symptoms, 67 moods, and energy levels to know your menstrual pattern
- Track daily chance of getting pregnant with BBT, cervical mucus, ovulation & pregnancy test records
- Baby's due date countdown
- Baby's weekly growth tracker
- Export a health report with charts for self-archive or doctors
- Insights from fertility specialists
- PIN code, Face ID, & Fingerprint lock to protect your private data
- Daily health tracker: weight, hydration, sleep, mood, sex, steps, etc.
- Breast self-exam guidance
- Multiple accounts to track for different, for example, mother/daughter 
- Unlimited app themes & pets
- Available in 39 languages
- Sync data with Apple Health
- Backup and restore data between devices
 
Note: Period Calendar should not be used to replace any form of contraceptive method.
 
Subscription Terms and Details
- Get unlimited access to all features for USD $49.99/year:
	• Cycle predictions for each month
	• Fertility analysis of each day
	• Unlock all self-care content
	• Kegel exercise for women
	• Unlimited app themes and pets
	• Remove ads forever
- The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Subscription may be managed, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase.
- The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.
 
If you have any questions or concerns while using our app, please feel free to contact us via feedback in our app ( [Settings] -> [Bug Report&Feedback]) or write to us at abishkking.apple@gmail. 
 
Privacy Policy: https://pc.abishkking.com/privacypolicy.html
Terms of Use: https://pc.abishkking.com/terms.html

INCI Beauty allows you to analyze the composition of cosmetic products simply, quickly, and for free!

Nearly 15,000 different chemical substances can be used in cosmetics. Which are controversial? Which are the most natural? Can some of them have a negative impact on our health or the environment?

Whether you're at home or in a store, INCI Beauty deciphers the contents of your cosmetic products or helps you gain insight before you buy.

INCI Beauty allows you to:

• View the detailed composition of a product by scanning its barcode or searching for it.
• Obtain a rating for each product between 0 and 20.
• Consult detailed information sheets for each cosmetic ingredient and quickly access their regulations worldwide (Europe, Canada, United States, etc.).
• Find a cleaner alternative to products whose rating doesn't satisfy you.
• Browse offers from different online retailers to purchase the product you're looking for.
• Enter restrictions to exclude an unwanted ingredient family.
• Share your opinion with the community using the like/dislike button or by writing a comment.
• Manage your bathroom content.
• Create and share skincare routines with other users.

With your user account (Free), you can:

• Choose an avatar, add a bio, indicate your social network profiles.
• View your search history and manage favorites.
• Add comments and take photos of unknown products.
• Follow and interact with users.

Become a contributor!

Help the INCI Beauty community by entering your own ingredients or those of another user to speed up the analysis of your pending products: https://open.incibeauty.com

How are ratings calculated?

Each component is rated according to its level of hazard or its potentially adverse effects on humans and nature. This is all done using a color code, symbolized by a flower, ranging from green to red. Find all the detailed information on our blog: https://incibeauty.com/theme/19-l-application-inci-beauty

Contact us?

If you have a question, suggestion, or encounter a problem, write to us: contact@incibeauty.com

Our general terms of use: https://incibeauty.com/cgu

HOW TO USE CAL AI:

1) Answer lifestyle questions to build your plan

2) Snap a photo of your meal*

3) Get your nutritional breakdown*

If you want to get your dream body, Cal AI will help you get there with less time spent than anyone else.

We aren't another complicated diet app. We want to empower everyone to be confident in their bodies with minimal time spent, but you have to work hard. We will support you and give you the tools and information you need.

If you have any ideas or questions, please email us at team@calai.app.

NOTE: We do not offer medical advice. Any and all recommendations should be viewed as suggestions, please consult with a professional and do your own research before trying a new calorie and nutrient plan.

*FOOD SCANNING ANALYSIS RESULTS REQUIRE A SUBSCRIPTION
TERMS: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Who is this app for?

• If you want to know your daily calorie intake required to lose weight, gain weight or maintain weight depending on your age, height, current weight and activity level, then this App is for you.

What can I do with the App?

• You can easily keep track of a food diary, and gain insight into your nutrition plan by tracking calories, carbohydrates, proteins, fats and more.

• Easily reach personal goals like losing body fat, gaining muscle or maintaining your current weight.

• Useful for active people practising sports, where meal planing can be crucial. 

• Easily create custom recipes, which can be shared with other users.

Contact us:
You have an awesome idea that you want to share, or you are missing a feature or just having issues? Then contact us.

• Facebook: https:fb.com/caloriecounter.bg
• Email:  contact@caloriecounter.bg
• Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
• Contacts: https://caloriecounter.bg/contacts

Track progress toward your nutrition, water, fitness, and weight loss goals with MyFitnessPal. This all-in-one food tracker and health app is like having a nutrition coach, meal planner, and food diary with you at all times.

MyFitnessPal isn’t another restrictive diet app. This is a health app to help you learn about your habits … see how you eat … make smarter food choices … find motivation & support ... and conquer your health goals.

Download and start your free 30-day Premium trial to access exclusive food tracking, fitness logging tools, and expert guidance. You’ll soon discover why MyFitnessPal is the #1 food and nutrition tracker in the U.S., a GQ 2020 Fitness Awards “Best Fitness App,” and has been featured in the New York Times, Wall Street Journal, the Today Show, and U.S. News & World Report.

SO MUCH MORE THAN A CALORIE TRACKER & FOOD JOURNAL

It’s like having a dietitian, personal trainer, and nutrition coach at your fingertips.

Log Food – Easy-to-use tools make food tracking quick and simple
Record Activity – Add workouts and steps with the fitness tracker
Customize Your Goals – Weight loss, weight gain, weight maintenance, nutrition & fitness
See Your Progress – Track at a glance, or analyze nutrition & calories in detail
Learn From a Registered Dietitian – Meal Plans customized for your target calories, whether you want to lose or gain weight—with access to our Meal Planner tool
Stay Inspired – 500+ healthy goal-focused recipes and 50 workouts keep routines fresh and fun
Connect With Community – Find friends and motivation in our active forums

A CLOSER LOOK AT FEATURES & BENEFITS

Gain Valuable Insights Through Food Logging

Discover which foods fuel you best. It’s not just a diet app, calorie counter to lose weight, or a faster way to fat loss—it’s about holding yourself accountable and understanding what you put in your body.

One of the Largest Food Databases – Track calories in over 14 million foods (including restaurant dishes)
Fast & Easy Food Tracker Tools – Type to search, add foods from your history, or quick-add calories
Bar Code & Meal Scan: Log store-bought foods and entire meals using your phone’s camera
Calorie Tracker – Automatically count calories and see your daily progress
Macro Tracker – See carbs, fat & protein breakdown by gram or percentage—no need for a separate carb tracker or keto diet app!
Nutrition Tracker and Insights – Analyze nutrition intake and set specific goals for macros, cholesterol, sodium, fiber & more
Water Logging – Easily keep track of your water intake. 

Customize Your App Experience

Choose settings that help you achieve your goals.

Custom Goals – Track calories by meal or day, set up macro goals & more
Personalized Dashboards – Pick stats you want to see at a glance
Net Carbs Mode/Carb Tracker – To simplify a low carb or keto diet, view net (not total) carbs
Protein Counter – Set your protein goals and track how much you eat during the day
Add Your Own Foods/Meal Tracker – Save recipes and meals for quick logging
Connect 50+ Apps & Devices – From fitness tracker and smartwatch apps, including the Health app
Track With Apple Watch – A calorie tracker, water tracker, and macro tracker on your watch face.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

MyFitnessPal is free to download and use. If you upgrade to MyFitnessPal Premium, we offer monthly & annual auto-renewing subscriptions.

Payment is charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless you turn off auto-renewal in iTunes Account Settings after purchase, or cancel your subscription at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period.

View our full terms & conditions and privacy policy: https://www.myfitnesspal.com/privacy-and-terms

We provide you with an easy and convenient way to track your workouts, book sessions, and gain access to your favorite fitness center. Our app allows you to enter the gym with just a QR code generated from your mobile device. Plan your workouts and book spots in group activities. Never miss your favorite yoga or Pilates session again! Stay informed! Receive notifications for upcoming workouts, special offers, and news from our fitness center.

Whether you're aiming to lose weight, gain muscle, or maintain a balanced diet, CalDiet supports your goals with tailored advice and real-time analysis. Achieve a healthier lifestyle with CalDiet!

KEY FEATURES:

Personalized Plans: Create tailored plans based on your lifestyle and goals.

Easy Nutrition Tracking: Simply snap a photo of your meals, then get your nutritional intake.

Exercise Tracking: Track with Apple Watch, record your daily activity and track calories burned.

See Your Progress: Track weight at a glance, or analyze nutrition & calories in detail

Intermittent Fasting: Lose fat 80% faster with proven intermittent fasting!

See Your Progress – Track weight at a glance, or analyze nutrition & calories in detail

CalDiet is your partner in reaching your goals faster, making it easier and effort for everyone to become healthier. Success requires your hard work, we provide the tools, support, and information to help you reach your goals.

Disclaimer: We do not provide medical advice. Always consult a healthcare professional before starting a new diet or fitness plan.

*SUBSCRIPTION REQUIRED FOR ALL CORE FEATURES: FOOD RECOGNITION, FOOD DATABASE, WORKOUTS, AND WATER TRACKING.

Terms of Service: http://landing.caldiet.online/terms-of-service.html
Privacy Policy: https://landing.caldiet.online/privacy-policy.html

Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:

• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.

• Discover anywhere – our Routes tool uses de-identified Strava data to intelligently recommend popular routes based on your preferences. You can also build your own.

• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.

• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.

• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.

• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.

• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).

• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.

• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.

• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.

Strava includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.
Strava uses HealthKit to export your Strava activities into the Health app and to read heart rate and biometric data.

You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Terms of Service: https://www.strava.com/legal/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.strava.com/legal/privacy

SOpharmacy е нова концепция аптеки, създадена с вдъхновение, енергия и професионализъм, за да предложи съвременен подход в обслужването на здравните потребности на българските пациенти. SOpharmacy е част от семейството на Софарма и продължава и надгражда дългогодишната традиция на компанията в грижата за здравето. SOpharmacy развива и собствена онлайн аптека sopharmacy.bg, в която се предлагат различни услуги, включително иновативната и популярна такава „Кликни и вземи“.


Фармацевтите в аптеки SOpharmacy ще Ви консултират индивидуално за съвременни и ефективни начини за облекчаване на някои от най-разпространените дискомфортни състояния, като различните видове болка, стомашни неразположения, безсъние и други. Разширената консултантска функция на фармацевтите е подкрепена със знания и обучения от медицински екип от специалисти. Стремежът на екипа на аптеки SOpharmacy е да предлага на своите клиенти иновативни продукти и услуги и широк набор от продукти за здраве и красота.
SOpharmacy следва нуждите на клиента и амбицията е да създаде цялостен omni channel, в който да се съчетаят предимствата на физическите обекти и онлайн. Стъпките в тази посока са създаването на online аптеката sopharmacy.bg и приложение SOpharmacy, които непрекъснато се надграждат и разширяват като функционалности, асортимент и промоционални активности.



Нашите ценности
•	Грижа
Ние се грижим за клиентите си като им предлагаме индивидуален здравен съвет и ефективно обслужване



•	Доверие

При нас клиентите се чувстват в спокойна, открита и дружелюбна среда



•	Богат избор

Предлагаме богат избор от различни брандове с качествени продукти на добра стойност, които клиентите обичат



•	Иновативност
Въвеждаме нови и иновативни продукти и услуги с грижа към нашите клиенти



•	Отдаденост
Ние печелим доверието, защото работим с вдъхновение, екипност и професионализъм, мислим за нуждите на клиента и ги поставяме на първо място


Нашата визия
SОpharmacy е предпочитаната аптека, защото вдъхновява грижата за здраве и красота!



Нашата мисия
Нашата мисия е да се превърнем в доверен партньор в грижата за здравето на клиента за цял живот!



С разбиране и грижа!

Useful BMI Calculator: Health Tracker - check your ideal weight exactly
Looking for a user-friendly app to track your weight and Body Mass Index (BMI)? Our BMI Calculator app is quick and convenient to use, motivate you to take steps to improve your health effectively.

Why choose BMI Calculator: Health Tracker App?

1. BMI score
2. BMI history
3. Healthy weight range
4. Input height and weight easily
5. Weight Tracker
6. For everyone! Adults, teens and children

3+ Key features of BMI Calculator: Health Tracker

* Smart BMI Calculator

Whether you're an adult, adolescent or even a child, our calculator provides accurate BMI results. BMI Calculator app quickly calculate your BMI by entering your height and weight. So you can understand whether you're underweight, normal, overweight or obese.

* Track Your Weight History

BMI Calculator: Health Tracker will record your weight daily to track weight gain/loss easily. Analyze your diary and adjust your weight plan more effectively.

* Detailed body data chart

The BMI weight history graph feature allows you to see your weight fluctuations over time. Choose any weekly, monthly or yearly chart to get an overview and adjust your weight accordingly.

Download BMI Calculator: Health Tracker to have a better and healthier body!

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

developer: FUTURE SOFT YAZILIM BILISIM DANISMANLIK HIZMETLERI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
FoodAI is your comprehensive AI-powered diet and nutrition companion. Whether you’re committed to the keto diet, intermittent fasting, or the mediterranean diet, Food AI creates a personalized plan based on your height, weight, allergies, target weight, and dietary preferences. The app supports a wide range of dietary needs, including the ketogenic diet plan, paleo diet, anti-inflammatory diet, and diabetic diet, ensuring that your goals are met with precision.

Effortlessly log your meals by snapping a photo or providing a brief description. FoodAI’s advanced artificial intelligence technology instantly recognizes your meals, accurately calculating macronutrients and calories. Whether you focus on high protein foods, low calorie snacks, or fiber-rich foods, Food AI simplifies tracking. The app is perfect for those on a high protein diet plan, seeking high protein snacks, or following a low carb diet plan.

Track your daily intake of essential nutrients, including vitamin D, iron, magnesium, and potassium-rich foods. FoodAI offers detailed insights into your nutrient consumption, helping you monitor foods high in iron, vitamin D foods, and potassium-rich foods. Review your intake over a day, week, or month, ensuring you meet dietary goals whether you’re on a DASH diet, carnivore diet, or pescatarian diet.

Consult your personal AI dietitian for tailored advice on achieving ketosis, the best way to lose weight, or planning healthy meals for dinner. Get instant, personalized responses whether you’re focused on losing weight fast, finding the best fat burner, or exploring metabolism boosters. You can ask about any diet plans including fodmaps diet and brat diet. The app also helps you maintain a calorie deficit and provides effective strategies for weight loss, including meal plans for weight loss, hcg diet, and weight loss supplements.

FoodAI supports diverse dietary preferences, including vegetarian diets, making it easy to find healthy snacks, high protein breakfasts, and low calorie snacks that fit your lifestyle. The app also helps with specific goals, like finding the best way to lose belly fat or managing a high protein diet.

Explore healthy meals for dinner, high fiber foods, and iron-rich foods with FoodAI. The app guides you in making informed decisions, whether you’re following a ketogenic diet, interested in foods high in magnesium, or looking for high protein snacks. Food AI is your ultimate tool for effective weight loss programs, offering meal plans for weight loss, weight watcher insights, and the fastest way to lose weight. Whether you’re aiming to lose weight, build muscle, or simply eat healthier, Food AI provides everything you need to succeed.

Focus, relax, and sleep through the power of sound. Endel creates AI-powered sounds designed to support your everyday life. Backed by science, and enjoyed by millions worldwide.

Endel is powered by its patented core AI technology. It takes inputs like location, environment, and heart rate, to create the optimal personalized soundscape. This happens on the fly and allows Endel to reconnect your state with your circadian rhythm.

Get access to the following classic soundscapes at home, work, or on the move to relax, concentrate, and minimize distractions and brain fatigue:


• Focus – boosts your productivity by helping you concentrate for longer

• Sleep – soothes you into a deep sleep with soft, gentle sounds

• Relax – calms your mind to create feelings of comfort and safety

• Move – feel grounded and present while walking, hiking, or running


ENDEL PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION


Alongside the classics, the Premium package contains the following Endel Soundscapes and features:

• Colored Noise – choose one of 9 colors of noise to focus, relax, sleep, and mask outside sound

• Study – improves concentration and keeps you calm while studying or working

• Dynamic Focus – get your perfect productivity support with real-time sound tuning

• Hibernation – nourish your ears with cozy sounds for cold-season slumber

• Nature Elements – nurture the mind with sounds of nature, your way

• Rainy Outside – cozy up to the gentle patter of rain, blended with sleep-aiding sounds

• Recovery – revives your wellbeing with sounds engineered to lower anxiety

• Spatial Orbit – venture into a more peaceful dimension with an immersive Spatial Audio experience

• Focus Timer – the famous interval work method, upgraded with science-backed Focus sounds


On top of the much-loved original Endel soundscapes, Endel works with innovative artists and thinkers to create unique experiences. These collaborative Endel Soundscapes are available for Premium users:


• James Blake: Wind Down – prepare your body for sleep with soothing sounds from an award-winning artist

• Grimes: AI Lullaby – supports sleep for babies and adults with original sounds and vocals from Grimes

• Plastikman: Deeper Focus – a deep focus techno soundscape created with Richie Hawtin

• Alan Watts: Wiggly Wisdom – soothing and motivation spoken word soundscape, infused with the playful wisdom from Alan Watts

• Miguel: Clarity Trip – elevate your every step with original sounds from Miguel

Endel Pacific is the patented technology that powers our apps and integrations. 

All soundscapes are available offline.

Apart from the Premium sounds and features, Endel Premium users get access to the exclusive Apple Podcast shows.


SUBSCRIPTION TERMS


Skip the payment screen by tapping “X” in the top-right corner of the offer. The Free Edition of Endel will start automatically.

You can get access to Endel Premium by subscribing to a recurrent plan of your choice or with a one-time Lifetime purchase.

Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

Payment will be charged to your Apple account at confirmation of purchase.

Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.

Combining Mi Fitness with smartwatch or smartband devices, users can track their health and fitness data. 

Mi Fitness supported：Xiaomi Watch Series, Redmi Watch Series, Xiaomi Smart Band Series, Redmi Smart Band Series.

Keep track of your workouts
Map your route, monitor your progress, and achieve your goals. Whether it's walking, running, or biking, you can easily track it right from your phone.
Monitor your health information*
Mi Fitness APP assists you in managing your personal health, helping you to always maintain your optimal state. By connecting Xiaomi or Redmi smartwatch/band devices, important health indicators such as heart rate, sleep, stress, and energy can be monitored and risk warnings generated throughout the day. Health data such as weight and women's health can also be manually recorded and managed.
Sleep better*
In conjunction with Xiaomi or Redmi smartwatch/band devices that has sleep monitoring functionality, you can record your sleep information every night. By conducting in-depth analysis of the different stages of sleep, including deep sleep, light sleep, and rapid eye movement, as well as monitoring your sleep heart rate, breathing quality, body movements, and other sleep-related data, the device generates a personalized sleep report. This report can help remind you to adjust your sleep habits in a timely manner.
Easy payments with wearable device
Link your Mastercard cards to Mi Fitness and enjoy the convenience of making payments on the go with your wearable device.
Ask Alexa for convenient access
With Alexa, you can easily access important features like checking the weather, playing music, and starting a workout. Just ask and you're good to go.
Stay informed with notifications
Receive notifications, messages, and emails directly on your wearable device, so you can stay informed without having to constantly check your phone.

*Disclaimer
Except for the manual health information recording service provided to users, all other health services within the application only synchronize and record the relevant information of the wristband or watch. All health-related data, results, suggestions, etc. are for reference only and are not intended for medical purposes, including self-diagnosis or consultation with a doctor, and are only used for general fitness and health purposes.
Please note that all smartwatches/fitness trackers currently integrated into the application are not medical devices and cannot provide any form of medical services. In case of any physical discomfort, please seek timely advice from medical institutions.

Get the fitness, sports, and health results you want with the Technogym app and Technogym Coach.

Whether you train at the gym, at home, or on the go, enjoy access to an on-demand library of 1,000+ workouts, personalized workout programs, classes, the Wellness Magazine, individual and community challenges, and more to stay on track with your goals and boost your performance. 


GET A PERSONALIZED PRECISION PROGRAM 

The AI-powered Technogym Coach gives you guidance and encouragement, whether you want to start working out, get stronger, tone up, play your favorite sport better, improve your athletic performance, or simply live a longer and healthier life. 

Just tell Technogym Coach what your goals are, how much time you want to work out, and what equipment you have on hand, and you’ll get a personalized Precision Program you can adjust any time based on your location, equipment, needs, and progress.


ACCESS 1000+ ON-DEMAND WORKOUTS

A huge on-demand workout library – including HIIT, yoga, Pilates, strength training, mindfulness and stretching, and more – is just a swipe away with new workouts added each week.

Browse workouts for any goal, muscle group, and level, whether you want self-guided exercises, to work out on equipment with instructor-led classes, do bodyweight workouts at home, or train outdoors. 


CREATE YOUR OWN WORKOUTS 

Decide your own training journey with the workout builder feature, whether your focus is on weightlifting, cardio, or bodyweight exercises. Create, save, and edit your own workouts for specific days, training needs, and goals, and track your progress over time. 


GET WELLNESS TIPS & NEWS

Stay up to date on the latest news and tips in the world of training, lifestyle, nutrition, and mindfulness with the Wellness Magazine.


TEST YOURSELF WITH CHALLENGES

A bit of healthy competition is a great way to test your limits and stay motivated. Join our challenges across a wide range of activities and sports and collect badges to show off.


MONITOR YOUR PROGRESS

The Technogym app is compatible with major third-party tracking devices and apps and heart rate monitors as well as Apple Health and Apple Watch so you can track your activities, health numbers and stats, and know where you are in your training journey. 

You can also monitor your health information in your personal Wellness Passport area of the app; collect MOVEs (units that measure how active you are); and check your MOVERGY level (your two-week MOVEs average).

Read our Terms of Use at https://cdnmedia.mywellness.com/privacy/v2/en/conditions.html and our Privacy Policy at https://cdnmedia.mywellness.com/privacy/v2/en/privacy.html

Bevel is the #1 app for improving your health, performance, and longevity, trusted by thousands and backed by science.

From sleep and recovery to stress and strength training, Bevel transforms your health data into personalized guidance you can actually use. Whether you're training for something big or just trying to feel better day to day, Bevel helps you move smarter, recover faster, and live longer without the guesswork.


FEATURES
Bevel Intelligence: Your smart health engine. Bevel Intelligence connects the dots across your data to give you instant feedback and personalized recommendations. It suggests when to train, when to rest, and what’s helping or hurting your progress so you can make better decisions with less effort.

Recovery Score:
Your daily readiness, simplified. Bevel helps you avoid overtraining, prevent injury, and build more sustainable habits by showing how prepared your body is to perform each day.

Sleep Score:
Track and understand your sleep with a single number. Bevel analyzes your sleep stages, duration, and interruptions to reveal how well you are actually resting each night. Bevel also features a smart alarm that wakes you at the optimal moment in your sleep cycle, so you start the day feeling refreshed.

Strain Score:
Measure how hard your body is working throughout the day. Your Strain Score is personalized based on your sleep and recovery, helping you train at the right intensity without burning out.

Nutrition Score: Log meals via Barcode Scan, Image Search, Recipe Creation, Describe Meal, or by searching through our database of over 6 million foods. Set calorie, macro, and nutrient goals all in one place. Bevel also supports glucose tracking, allowing you to see how food affects your metabolism in real-time.

Stress Score: See how stress shows up in your body. Bevel provides you with a real-time score, allowing you to understand your stress patterns during sleep, workouts, and daily life.

Strength Builder: Train smarter with Bevel’s strength trainer. Choose from over 700 exercises, sync workouts between your watch and phone, and receive real-time feedback on muscular strain. You can even generate custom plans or log past workouts to keep your progress on track.

Energy Bank: Think of it as your body’s battery. Bevel combines recovery, sleep, strain, and stress into a single metric to help you understand how your energy levels build and drain throughout the day.

Biology: Your biology tells the story of how your body is adapting, performing, and recovering. Bevel helps you track key markers, such as VO2 max, HRV, and body composition, to monitor progress and stay in tune with your health over time.

Journal: Track habits that impact your health. Use Journal to log hydration, sunlight, screen time, and more. Bevel shows you how small behaviors add up and affect your sleep and recovery.


SUBSCRIPTION AND TERMS

Bevel is available for free with the option to upgrade to Bevel Pro with an auto-renewing subscription. You may switch off auto-renew in your Apple ID Account Settings.

Purchases of premium subscriptions will be charged using your Apple ID upon confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions renew on a monthly or yearly basis, unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. If canceled, subscriptions remain valid until the end of the current period, and any unused portions are not valid for a refund.

By completing your purchase, you affirm your understanding of the following:

Privacy Policy: https://docs.bevel.health/privacy-policy

Bevel is not a medical device and is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, monitor, or prevent medical conditions or illnesses. Always consult your physician first. All information provided is for general informational purposes only.

My Calendar – Period Tracker by Simple Innovation is an elegant and easy-to-use period tracker that helps you take control of the many aspects of your menstrual cycle — from ovulation, fertility and periods, to birth control pills, moods and other symptoms.

Whether you are concerned about conceiving, birth control and contraception, or regularity of period cycles, Period Calendar can help. Our tracker is easy to use and offers everything you need: Track irregular periods, weight, temperature, moods, blood flow, symptoms and more.

Be PREPARED for your PERIOD:
- MAKE PLANS for rest and work
- Be CONFIDENT about your HEALTH. Add information to the app, use it to answer your doctor’s questions.
- Note SYMPTOMS, get insights. Use the charts to track changes.
- Track OVULATION and FERTILITY dates. 
- Keep your data SECRET. Use pin-code, face-ID or a fingerprint to keep the data safe.
- Take PILLS on time. Use reminders so you don't miss your pill time.

Discreet reminders keep you informed and prepared by predicting upcoming periods, ovulation, and fertile days. The app adapts to your cycle history and the calculator accurately predicts the important events during your cycle.

Key features:
- Vital info at a glance: intuitive calendar home page lets you visualize non-fertile, fertile, ovulation, expected period and actual period
- Entire cycle log and settings can be backed up and restored easily and quickly. Never be afraid to lose your calendar data, even when you lost your phone or get a new one.
- Detailed tracking: daily planner lets you save essential period information like flow, intercourse, symptoms, moods, temperature, weight, medicine, PMS, other cervical observations, and general diary notes
- Always stay in the loop with notifications for upcoming period, fertility windows or ovulation
- Protect your most private data from curious eyes: password lock it using a unique PIN code
- Personalize and make it yours: Gorgeous new watercolor themes, adjust period prediction intervals, luteal phase length, plus choose your units of measure and the first day of the week (Sunday or Monday) – all in Settings
- Abstinence mode hides ovulation, fertility and intercourse related data—perfect tracker for girls and teens just starting their periods
- Want to start fresh? Just reset it

You can track changes and symptoms during perimenopause, such as hot flashes, night sweats, mood swings, and irregular cycles.
Stay in control of your health with personalized insights and reminders tailored for this important life stage.
